indicator_name: Proporción de menores entre 2 y 17 años con obesidad, sobrepeso o peso insuficiente
national_indicator_description: Proporción de menores entre 2 y 17 años con obesidad, sobrepeso o peso insuficiente
target_name: By 2030, end all forms of malnutrition, including achieving, by 2025, the internationally agreed targets on stunting and wasting in children under 5 years of age, and address the nutritional needs of adolescent girls, pregnant and lactating women and older persons
goal_name: End hunger, achieve food security and improved nutrition and promote sustainable agriculture
source_organisation_1: Elaborated by SADEI based on data from the sources detailed in the methodology
